text: @realDonaldTrump Silent majority is going down quick. All polls show Biden is ahead. And when cases of covid-19 go sky high after your big rally you will be blamed. You know it is unsafe or you wouldn't be having everyone sign a waiver that they won't sue you. That coming from the KING of sueing
